name: In this city over there
description:
NOTE: This uses the exit through dialogue bitsy hack which might make it not work on some devices??

Quick game made in the span of about 2-3 days to procrastinate on working on other games and drawing. Should be about 10 minutes of gameplay. Take control of NAGE as they explore sort of noir CITY for their missing friend, but something else is afoot in this extremely exaggerated story based on real life(??)...!

I prioritized finishing this over making it good so the writing is very sloppy at times. Please think about it less than I thought when writing this!

Made in bitsy which was made by the cool and hip Adam Le Doux: [https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy]

end through dialog and exit through dialog by @mildmojo: [https://github.com/seleb/bitsy-hacks]
